website_summaries.verdict: Constructed of quality materials that keep you safe without interfering with performance.
pros: CE rated armor that allows for movement and flexibility
Customers note an increase in confidence while riding
High marks for both its alignment and fit that easily adapts to a variety of jackets
cons: Some would prefer an even stronger spine protector that wasn't so form fitting

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adding additional protection to your jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the stock non-CE foam pad that came in my Joe Rocket jacket. This one is noticeable thicker and better built, and I trust it to protect my spine in the event I ever go down. Well worth the piece of mind and I recommend you buy this one if you don't already have a CE rated back plate.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Size small for women - great addition to my Stella jacket
customer_reviews.text: Wish the description didn't say "men's" because the small size is dedicated to women's jackets. My Alpinestars Stella jacket didn't come with a back protector, so I added this for more safety and it fits perfectly in the dedicated pocket in the jacket. I was worried it would feel stiff or bulky or be visible through my jacket, but it is very light and flexible, so it forms to your figure when you put it on and does not change the look of the jacket at all when wearing it. I would highly recommend adding this to your jacket if yours didn't come with one. Always better to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: LindaYoshi

customer_reviews.title: Good protector. Aligns to my back pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to beef up the protection in a textile jacket that I ordered (Scorpion Eddy) as the installed padding just didn't seem like it was enough. It installed into the pocket in seconds, and I immediately felt much more confident in the safety of the jacket. The holes also allow for great airflow and doesn't feel constricting in any way.
customer_reviews.author: V.K.

customer_reviews.title: Safety, safety, safety
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for the flimsy armor in my new bike jacket. This is just the ticket. It has ventilation holes and doesn't feel heavy at all. I had to trim it a bit to fit the armor pocket, but it was no big deal. All in all it's a great product and I hope I never have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fits a Revit jacket nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this protector to fit in my Revit jacket since I did not find the Revit back protector very comfortable. I bought a size medium and it is almost a perfect fit for the pocket which is designed for an RV-04 protector. The Alpinestars protector is flexible, has excellent ventilation, and is comfortable to wear. The price is very competitive. I bought this from an Amazon reseller and the shipping and customer service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Alpinestars Nucleon KR-2i
customer_reviews.text: I don't even feel it in my Astars leather. I haven't put it to the ultimate test yet. However, I did test a dia- brand leather jacket without a back protector resulting in 7 broken vertebrae. Won't make that mistake again. DON"T neglect buying a back protector with your new jacket!!!
customer_reviews.author: kevin highfill

customer_reviews.title: Do it! I love this product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! It fit perfectly in the designated slot for my Xl alpinestars jacket and you can bearly even notice its in there. If your considering this product I deffinatly give the go ahead on this buy. And remember they do make a stronger option if that is what your looking for aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus b.

customer_reviews.title: Seems good.
customer_reviews.text: Fits A* Valparaiso 2 jacket. Seems to be high quality. Better than the stock protection the jacket came with by far. Forms very well to the back and you won't even notice it there. Seems to breath just as well with it in versus out. Hopefully I never need it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven N

customer_reviews.title: Love IT! Please buy this (or a decent back protector in general) if you don't have one yet.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely get one of these if you have an Alpine jacket and need one and DEFINITELY GET IT if you just bought your first motorcycle jacket. Unless you are buying the really expensive jackets that come with these types of inserts already, your jacket will come with a thin flimsy peace of garbage that wont do anything but laugh when your spine snaps.
customer_reviews.author: AznMikeD

customer_reviews.title: Flexibility
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece that fits right into my Alpinestars jacket. The jacket unfortunately did not come with a back protector but I sure was glad to find this one. When I opened up it was very "flexible", which is good because you want that to conform to you back to take the shape when you're riding. I put it in my jacket and it fit perfectly. I really liked how it's light weight and flexible with CE protection.
customer_reviews.author: Grahm

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the foam shield of my joe rocket atomic 5 jacket. Feels sturdy and reliable. I don’t want to put a price on safety but a retail price of nearly $60 is a little steep for a thick piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lemoine

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: more back protection in case of a slide instead of a ride. fits perfectly into the jacket
customer_reviews.author: james miles

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pad. It is extremely maleable but will figgt you of tou try to move it suddendly like would happen in a wreck. Comfy. Used in an alplinstars winter jacket "the Mack" and a Dainese D1 Avro
customer_reviews.author: Captain Space Boot

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and you don't even know it is there.
customer_reviews.text: Fit in my speed and strength off the chain 2.0 jacket perfectly (medium). Very comfortable and pliable.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't ride a motorcycle but I bought this to protect my back after I suffered a severe muscle strain. Sometimes I use it as a seat cushion too (LOL)
customer_reviews.author: Dae J.  Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Back Protector!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly in the armor pocket for the wife's Harley jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Jake C6R

customer_reviews.title: A-stars back protector
customer_reviews.text: I think it's awesome. It feel sturdier than that initial foam insert. Always wearing a backpack with my work computer and lunch, I feel like there is more protection if I go down and I have a can of soup in my bag. It also creates a gap between the bag and my back, so I get more airflow on my back. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased this with the chest insert and I'm very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with the chest insert and I'm very happy with them! Hopefully these don't have to touch concrete but I'm pretty confident it would protect me in a crash.
customer_reviews.author: 625smc

customer_reviews.title: As for functionality they work great, hopefully I never need
customer_reviews.text: These should come standard in Alpinestars Jackets instead of the fake foam they come with now . As for functionality they work great,hopefully I never need them
customer_reviews.author: Excel

customer_reviews.title: Good and comfortable, but small for a small
customer_reviews.text: Good protection. Small seems a little too small, but maybe I ordered the wrong size. I wear a medium women's Alpine star jacket. I'm average sized so I thought small would be a good fit. I mean, it still offers protection, but I thought there would be a little more back coverage.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonRocks

customer_reviews.title: Good quality replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the worthless 1/4 foam pad in my Bilt mesh jacket. Fits tight and is comfortable and I am sure if I need it, it will provide much better protection.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Clair

customer_reviews.title: What is expected from Alpinestars
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight comfortable, a solid back protector. Nothing bad, nothing mind blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Medium armor fit my medium jacket. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tobe Cassie

customer_reviews.title: It feels like it will actually protect you
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic piece of protective gear. Way more comfortable and sturdy than the cheap foam pieces that make you sweat. Solid purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brett F.

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly in my jacket. With a bit of luck, I'll never have to see if it actually works!
customer_reviews.author: nitewatch

customer_reviews.title: but it is totally comfortable and don't even think it is there as I ...
customer_reviews.text: I can feel it on my back when wearing my leather jacket, but it is totally comfortable and don't even think it is there as I am riding. Also much cooler than the foam pad most jackets come with.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Antonio Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The product has a perfect weight, it is not too much heavy, neither thick. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: William Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not as described in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Product sent to me was not as described in the picture it just a foam pad for $59? I don't think so returning the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, super light
customer_reviews.text: This back insert fit my jacket very well. I’m happy my with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Much needed protection
customer_reviews.text: Adds the protection I was looking for! My jacket is a men's 2xl and this fits great.
customer_reviews.author: RRISSLERR

customer_reviews.title: really the best. Incredible material
customer_reviews.text: Contours to your back and body, really the best. Incredible material.
customer_reviews.author: Yi-Wen H.

customer_reviews.title: Great, feels sturdy and protective and I can't tell ...
customer_reviews.text: Great, feels sturdy and protective and I can't tell a difference in air flow. I love my spinal cord so I bought this and you should too.
customer_reviews.author: Kyoto_Kinniku

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for my Alpinestars jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for my Alpinestars jacket. Seems like quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit in my A* Brera jacket. I bought the large and my jacket is a 52Euro. Would def buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable and breathable
customer_reviews.text: If you care about safety you have to wear this! It is comfortable and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: S2K777

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Item is super light, and forms to my back. I recommend getting it to replace the standard that comes with the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried it out but I don’t plan on it. Seems like it’ll kee my mans safe though
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get it find something better
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t even come close to what it looked like in the picture. it’s literally a 10 dollar piece of foam that I could of made from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: blake sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Can't put a price on your life get the protection!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my X-Large Alpinestars T-GP Plus R v2 Air just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Better than what I expected. Fit great in my riding jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Messner

customer_reviews.title: Better than factory pad
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it will work and much better than the foam pad that comes with most jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great spine protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go into a different brand motorcycle jacket and it fits well after some minor modifications with a pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Greg V

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and light
customer_reviews.text: Great protector. Flexible and light. You hardly notice it on your back.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it would protect me
customer_reviews.text: Fits in two different jackets I have. Seems like it would protect me. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great airflow, barely notice it's there. Fits perfect in a jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon & Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: this insert fits the alpine star jacket that I have. Though it is not has hard as I expected. It is firm and semi pliable. I can see this providing some protection with that i would've wanted this product to be a hard substance.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hernandez

product_meta.title: Alpinestars Men's 6501615-10-L Back Protection Foam (Nucleon Kr-2I L) (Black, Large)
product_meta.description: Size:Large| Color:BlackLightweight, flexible pu-injected impact foam contoured for an anatomical, adaptive fit perforated for breathability and comfort
feature_bullets: Contoured for an anatomical, Adaptive fit
